prompts: Create a playful Pokemon that loves to eat and has a big, round body.
Imagine a Pokemon with a long tongue and a cheerful demeanor, perfect for kids.
Design a pink, chubby Pokemon that rolls around in the grass and enjoys company.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a giant lollipop, with a sweet disposition and friendly nature.
Show me a happy, round Pokemon that can be found in urban areas, always looking for snacks.
Make a quirky Pokemon that has oversized features, perfect for a cartoonish adventure.
Give me a chubby Pokemon with a soft belly, known for its gentle and friendly personality.
